name_basics.table_description: contains the following basic information for names.

deathyear.description: in yyyy format if applicable, else '\n'.
deathyear.name: deathyear

knownfortitles.description: titles the person is known for.
knownfortitles.name: knownfortitles

nconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the name/person.
nconst.name: nconst

primaryname.description: name by which the person is most often credited.
primaryname.name: primaryname

primaryprofession.description: the top-3 professions of the person.
primaryprofession.name: primaryprofession

title_akas.table_description: contains the following common information for titles.

attributes.description: additional terms to describe this alternative title, not enumerated.
attributes.name: attributes

ordering.description: a number to uniquely identify rows for a given titleid.
ordering.name: ordering

region.description: the region for this version of the title.
region.name: region

titleid.description: a tconst, an alphanumeric unique identifier of the title.
titleid.name: titleid

types.description: enumerated set of attributes for this alternative title. one or more of the following: "alternative", "dvd", "festival", "tv", "video", "working", "original", "imdbdisplay". new values may be added in the future without warning.
types.name: types

title_basics.table_description: contains the following basic information for titles.

endyear.description: tv series end year. ‘\n’ for all other title types.
endyear.name: endyear

genres.description: includes up to three genres associated with the title.
genres.name: genres

originaltitle.description: original title, in the original language.
originaltitle.name: originaltitle

primarytitle.description: the more popular title / the title used by the filmmakers on promotional materials at the point of release.
primarytitle.name: primarytitle

startyear.description: represents the release year of a title. in the case of tv series, it is the series start year.
startyear.name: startyear

tconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the title.
tconst.name: tconst

titletype.description: the type/format of the title (e.g. movie, short, tvseries, tvepisode, video, etc).
titletype.name: titletype

title_crew.table_description: contains the director and writer information for all the titles in imdb.

tconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the title
tconst.name: tconst

episodenumber.description: episode number of the tconst in the tv series.
episodenumber.name: episodenumber

parenttconst.description: alphanumeric identifier of the parent tv series.
parenttconst.name: parenttconst

seasonnumber.description: season number the episode belongs to.
seasonnumber.name: seasonnumber

title_principals.table_description: contains the principal cast/crew for titles.

category.description: the category of job that person was in.
category.name: category

characters.description: the name of the character played if applicable, else '\n'.
characters.name: characters

job.description: the specific job title if applicable, else '\n'.
job.name: job

nconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the name/person.
nconst.name: nconst

ordering.description: a number to uniquely identify rows for a given titleid.
ordering.name: ordering

tconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the title.
tconst.name: tconst

title_ratings.table_description: contains the imdb rating and votes information for titles.

averagerating.description: weighted average of all the individual user ratings.
averagerating.name: averagerating

numvotes.description: number of votes the title has received.
numvotes.name: numvotes

tconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the title.
tconst.name: tconst
